svg.title: Lendmarket
svg.desc: Lendmarket is the first secondary market platform for corporate debt, which brings investors into contact with debt originators that offer holdings of Direct Lending funds or loans on Crowdlending platforms. Our goal is to give investors access to the corporate debt market, until now only accessible to institutional clients and Family Offices, offering a great diversification in high quality loans, with an excellent return-to-risk ratio.
